game.risk.model.valueobjects

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • game.risk.model.valueobjects.Map

  • public class Map
extends java.util.Observable
    Map class. This class keeps record of all the Countries, Continents and Players involve in the game
    Since:
    10-October-2017
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Ziba Khaneshi
